name: TUMBLE TUNDRA
description:
This is game #2 of my 12 Games in 12 Months Challenge I've set for myself in 2023. I hope you guys enjoy.

The song that plays throughout your climb in Tumble Tundra was released as part of MunkieMix Vol 2 by Munkie Beets. It is what inspired this project.

Special thanks to  Robert for his help decorating the rooms and to SnailKnight for suggesting the name "Tumble Tundra" for the game.

Controls: 

Aim your Jump with the MOUSE

Hold down LEFT CLICK or SPACE to charge your Jump
